ratatouille.ponder.oven.header: Bake Food Efficiently with the Oven
ratatouille.ponder.oven_fan.header: Blowers Supply Airflow to the Oven
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_1: The oven is heated by a Blaze Burner.
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_2: A dedicated fan provides airflow to the oven.
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_3: With sufficient heat, airflow, and space...
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_4: ...it can cook all types of food efficiently!
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_5: Higher efficiency requires more space, heat, and airflow.
ratatouille.ponder.oven.text_6: Use Engineer's Goggles to inspect its current power level.
ratatouille.ponder.thresher.text_1: The thresher can process various crops.
ratatouille.ponder.thresher.text_2: Outputs are ejected from the side with a chute.
ratatouille.ponder.thresher.text_3: Can be placed on a belt for automated processing.
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.header: Process Items with the Squeeze Basin
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.text_1: The squeeze basin performs squeezing and filling.
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.text_2: It is powered by a compression roller. Outputs are sent below the spout side.
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.text_3: Fluids can also be input into the basin.
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.text_4: Some recipes require items to be inserted into the spout.
ratatouille.ponder.squeeze_basin.text_5: Deployer arms can automate this process efficiently.
ratatouille.ponder.spreader.header: Accelerate Growth with the Crop Spreader
ratatouille.ponder.spreader.text_1: The spreader accelerates crop growth in a radius.
ratatouille.ponder.spreader.text_2: Each activation consumes one bone meal.
ratatouille.ponder.spreader.text_3: Increasing speed and placing a spreader mesh in front greatly expands its effect.
ratatouille.ponder.irrigation_tower.head: Keep Farmland Moist with the Irrigation Tower
ratatouille.ponder.irrigation_tower.text: The irrigation tower keeps farmland within range moist.
Fill its internal tank with water before use.
